articles.title: George Floyd’s murder led to a national reckoning on policing, but efforts have stalled or reversed - NBC News
articles.description: Four years ago, protests erupted across the country after millions of Americans watched the chilling video of the murder of George Floyd by a Minneapolis police officer.
